iterations.code:
module TopModule(
    input wire a,
    input wire b,
    input wire c,
    input wire d,
    output wire out_sop,
    output wire out_pos
);

    // Minimized Sum-of-Products (SOP) for outputs 2, 7, 15
    assign out_sop = (~d & ~c & b & ~a) |  // 2: 0010
                     (~d & c & b & a)  |  // 7: 0111
                     (d & c & b & a);     // 15: 1111

    // Minimized Product-of-Sums (POS) for outputs 2, 7, 15
    assign out_pos = (d | c | ~b | a) &
                     (d | ~c | ~b | ~a) &
                     (~d | c | b | a);

endmodule
issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
